title: Supplications for Breaking the Fast (Iftar)
description: Common narrated supplications to be recited at the moment of breaking the fast, including the specific invocation of Imam Ali (a.s.).

phrases.arabic: أن يدعو عند الإفطار بالدعوات المأثورة ومنها:
phrases.english: That one should supplicate at the time of breaking the fast with the narrated supplications, among which are:
phrases.transliteration: An yad‘ū ‘inda al-ifṭāri bi-d-da‘awāti l-ma’thūrati wa minhā:

phrases.english: O Allah, for You I have fasted,
and with Your provision I have broken my fast.
And in You I have placed my trust (9).

phrases.arabic: ب) وكان أميرالمؤمنين عليه السلام إذا أراد أن يفطر يقول:
phrases.english: Whenever the Commander of the Faithful, peace be upon him, intended to break his fast, he would say:
phrases.transliteration: b) Wa kāna Amīru l-Mu’minīn ‘alayhi s-salām idhā arāda an yufṭira yaqūl:

phrases.english: O Allah, for You we have fasted.
And with Your provision we have broken our fast.
